meta_description: The American Civil War Museum is more than a collection of artifacts, we are educators and storytellers connecting the Civil War and its legacies to current culture.

# Plan Your Visit

We look forward to welcoming you to all three of our locations in Richmond and Appomattox! For student/youth groups planning to visit our sites, click [here](https://acwm.org/visit/group-tours/). Traveling in a group of 15 or more? Check out our group tour offerings [here](https://acwm.org/visit/group-tours/#adult-group-tours)!

#  [ The ACWM 2026 Symposium (February 13 – 15) ](https://acwm.org/event/relationships-forged-in-war-symposium-february-13-15/)

The American Civil War was not only a clash of armies and ideologies, but it also shaped and tested loyalty, friendship, family, and enmity on the battlefield and within the halls of government across a divided nation. 

New to the symposium this year! A full weekend Civil War history experience you may customize to your schedule and interests.

[ Learn More ](https://acwm.org/event/relationships-forged-in-war-symposium-february-13-15/)
